Text:

4.38GB? You know if you compressed this, it would be 250MB and scrubbed it's only 50MB.
Fail rip ... Dunno. I converted this to WBFS format to play on Configurable USBLoader and it freezes to the loading screen ... :/ halp ?
I as well converted it to WBFS and am using USB Loader GX and it freezes on the loading screen...bad copy?
for all those that carnt get this to work, search torrentz for Black Ops Files For Wii USB Loader GX. it works for all new games
I've done what says on "Black Ops Files For Wii USB Loader GX" successfully but this game still doesn't work for me.

I am using cfg usb loader and setting IOS to 247.

It's the only way I've found to get around the freezing intro error.
I got it work with wiiflow and cios250[57]-v20 but make sure to have your cios249 base 58 or it will not work.  I can not get it to work with USB Loader.    Great Game Thanks :)
I got it to work using Cfg_USB 7.0 & in the options for the game told it to load using ios 223

Hmm.... 

It says that i have to update my wii... but i hava a cracked wii, what should i do?
Usb loader. Change the Ios to 223 and it works fine :)
Using Wiiflow, how/where do I change the IOS? From HBC or when the SD card is plugged into my PC?

Game works great for me I also have done the black ops, Also it helps if your change the settings to force your region example for me (force NTSC)
remember to please SEEEEEED I will be seeding for at least a week
